11.content: How does she gain weight?

choices: eat at a fat fast food reastraunt
111.content:
(look i know it says force feed but she just eats with noone forcing food in her mouth k)

akiza was waking in her house looking beautiful as always her dress that had her humungus boobs hangging out a little

akiza: man im tired to being hot and sexy i want to be big fat and round

akiza thought of some ways and made a concusion
111.title: Forced Feed

1111.content:
continue with this story of Akiza wanting to be fat
or
pursue the initial force feeding
or
someone convinces her to gain
1111.title: eat tons of sweets

choices: Find a good place to sit down and stuff her face.
11111.content:
Akiza had never really understood why people prefers to be skinny. She knew that being too fat was really bad for you, but she wasn’t trying to gain that much, she hated her diet, and there were medical routines and all that to help you achieve and keep you in your dream shape. She had done her research, but for now, she just wanted to toss away her diet, binge out, and make a pig of herself.

She had a fair few places in New Domino City to go and stuff herself full of food, or she could keep it simple, with, say, a ton of Dark Choclate(and a lot of toothpaste and floss)?

What was a girl to choose?
11111.title: wants to be fat

11112.content:
Whose responsible for fattening Akiza?

Girls:

Sherry LeBlanc
Misty
11112.title: force feeding

111122.content:
“.......urgghhh...”
Akiza’s eyes slowly fluttered open as she regained consciousness, her mind still half asleep.....as she sat up, it took her a moment to realise something.
“....where...am I?”
She had no idea were she was, or how she got here. Trying to think, Akiza shifted into a kneeling position, as she tried to remember. What she managed to remember, was worrying: she had been walking around downtown, when she had been grabbed by the waist, pulled into a sidestreet, and then a rag had been shoved over mouth, and her consciousness had faded......

Kidnapped. But by who? And where was she? Her eyes were still adjusting.....

“Well, Akiza....I see you’re awake. That’s good. It means I can start my revenge sooner.”

....no way. That voice was Misty Treadwell’s. But why was she doing this? The Dark Signers had been defeated months ago! What’s more, Akiza had cleared the misunderstanding between the two! What was going on?!
111122.title: Misty

1111221.content:
Akiza’s response was panicked. “M-Misty? What’s going on? What revenge?” Her eyes had started to adjust, and now she could see Misty, her face like it was when she was a Dark Signer.

Misty’s eyes narrowed and she leered at Akiza, her gaze hateful. “Don’t play ignorant with me, Akiza. Revenge for my younger brother, who you killed in cold blood. Didn’t you, Black Rose?”

What the hell?! Had she forgotten the last few months entirely?! “Misty, it wasn’t me! It was Sayler who killed your brother! Don’t you remember?!” Was she.......No, it wasn’t possible...


“Lies!” Misty’s expression was one of rage. “I know you killed Toby! And if even if you won’t admit it, you know you killed him! But don’t worry about killing anyone else, Akiza. Because I’ll make sure you never harm anyone ever again.”

Akiza glanced around her eyes fully adjusted. It looked like she was in a warehouse, with tons of crates stacked high to the ceiling. “Just w-what are you gonna do to me? Tourture me to death? Beat me bloody in a card game? I can take it, Misty-“

Akiza was cut of by Misty softly chuckling. If she was normal, Misty’s laugh might have been cute. But as she was, it came off as unsettling....”No, Akiza. I don’t have any tools to torture you, believe it or not. I wouldn’t be able to stomach them. But maybe you can stomach what I have planned for you...” She chuckled again, a bit louder this time.

Out of the corner of her eye, Akiza spotted a label on a nearby crate. She turned to look at at it. It read:
——++————————-++———-
Dark Choclate Cake- Bulk Shipping
120 per crate
For various Bakeries in Neo Domino
————#———-#————-#———
No...she possibly couldn’t-
Misty’s response was the confirmation of her fears. “After all, you cant hurt anyone....if you can’t move.”


Akiza’s eyes widened in fearful shock.
1111221.title: “Misty, what’s going on?!”

11112211.content:
A soft, simple, “Oh no.....” was the only thing that came out of Akiza’s mouth.

Misty’s smug reply of “Oh yes.” was laced with taunting. “I know how much you like sweets, Akiza. So I thought that I’d treat you to a rather sweet buffet...at the expense of your waistline, of course.”

Misty walked over to the nearest crate to Akiza, and pushed the lid off it. The wooden slab clunked to the ground heavily, as Misty pulled out a cake from the crate. Akiza knee what would happen to her if any of that cake entered her mouth....More would fimd it’s way in, and on to her waist, until she burst or became too big...she didn’t know which of the two Misty was aiming for.

“Now....shall we start.....Akiza-kun...?” The grin on Misty’s face was that of a psychopath’s....she slowly walked towards Akiza, pulling the cake out from it’s box.....

Akiza clenched her jaw tight and refused to open it. At least, that was her plan. The cake’s aroma was delicious and wafting up her nose..(it smelt so good-she wanted to taste it-but she couldn’t let Misty have her way with her-you need to breath with your mouth-she could breath with her nose- the smell is in your nose-you can taste it on your tounge-)
“Mrpphhh?!”
“Got you.” Misty’s psycho grin had vanished, replaced by a simple smile.
A lapse of concentration meant that Akiza had opened her mouth, and Misty had shoved the entire cake into Akiza’s mouth. Forced to chew and swallow lest she choke to death, Akiza had much time to sample the flavour of the cake.

And she loved it.

It was very rich, and it tasted much like Dark Chocolate-oh my goodness, it was dark chocolate!-with chocolate icing. Her taste buds felt like they had died and gone to heaven....As she swallowed it, a sense of blissful wanting spread through her, like her body wanted more-it needed more, that blissful feeling she didn’t want to stop-but this was Misty’s doing-her belly felt full and empty at the same time-it was a whole cake and she wanted more.


#—-#
Misty gazed at Akiza. The girl seemed to be very much enjoying her meal, her eyes narrowed in bliss, some chocolate around her mouth, her jaw working hard to chew up the cake. Her belly was already beginning to expand out, ever so slightly. Her arm was glowing with that Signer Mark, for whatever reason, Misty didn’t care about the mark. She wanted Akiza’s thoughts.

“So, Akiza.....How was that cake, just now?”

“..Mruph..pluh..”

Misty’s psycho grin retuned to her face. “What was that? You should know better then to speak with your mouth full, Akiza-kun.”

Akiza’s response was after she had swallowed the last bits of the cake. “M-more....”
11112211.title: “Oh, no...”

11113.content:
Truth is, Akiza wasn’t too concerned with her original reason. It was just her muttering to herself. What she really wanted to do was to get Yusei’s attention.

The other day, she had been by his place, and found him not working on a Duel Runner, but rather reading a magazine with red cheeks and unzipped pants. His reaction when he had noticed Akiza was not very much like him, as he had panicked, quickly hid the magazine, and tried to pass it off like everything was normal. She hadn’t seen much but the cover’s picture of a rather heavyset woman ( the name of the magazine was sometjing like ‘BBWG Monthly” had tipped her off: Yusei liked his ladies large.

This had basically given Akiza a bit more insight on what Yusei liked in a woman. And she could use that to her advantage to get his attention. So now, she had a lam, or rather, two plans. She could find a copy of that magazine, and from gather information on how to best gain weight(healthy) and possibly there question Yusei, or she could find a place and stuff herself silly, and get ahead start on getting a wider frame. What was she to do first?
11113.title: gains for someone else

12.content:
Carly Carmine, a voluptous girl with thick glasses and long black hair, looked down at her self. She was sad. The apple of her eye, Jack Atlas, had left out of town and she had no means of contact. She started to partake in a new method of keeping herself busy. She'd gorge herself in comfort foods, particularly sugary ones. Soda, cake, candy, if it was sugary, she'd eat it.

One day, she decided to weigh herself, now having a small muffin top. She checked the scale, and it said she gained...
12.title: The Beginning

121.content:
“EEEEEEEYYYYYYAAHHHHHHHHHHH!?!?!”

The shriek of shock Carly let out was louder then she thought, much as her weight gain was larger then she had realised. She knew she had been binge eating, but she didn’t realise how much she had actually consumed. But if it was enough to cause this...

“Oh no! It’s bigger then I thought it was!” Carly yelled, trying to hold her fattened gut in her hands. It wasn’t that big yet, but it was big enough for a noticeable muffin top and she could hold it with the palms of her hands, and her problems didn’t end there.

“Eep! What’s pinching my butt?! Carly felt around her backside, and realised her weight gain had spread around her whole body. Her panties were a size too small, and were digging into her rear. Her bra was also tighter, not painfully so, but still.....Bright red and panicked, Carly gazed into the mirror at her body.

https://www.deviantart.com/eishiban/art/...

“Oh no...oh, no no no no....how did I not notice this untill now?!”

Carpet didn’t know what to do next.
121.title: Carly’s weighty discoveries

choices: Make some talk at the door
1213.content:
Before Carly could break down crying or compose herself, the doorbell to her flat rang.

“What the? Who’s-someone’s at the door!” She said, with a hint of panic. If someone saw her like this....! Maybe it was the mailman or a neighbor she had startled-

The doorbell rang again. Panicked, Carly quickly begun to redress herself, so as to try to look decent. Her shirt slid tightly back on, it failing to stretch to cover her new gut, amd her arms feeling slightly compressed by the long sleeves. Worse, now she couldn’t get her jeans up to her hips, thanks to her fattened legs and rear and the pants legs were very much stretched out.

“I knew these were fake denim.....!” she muttered irately. She had payed $30 for these...! Then the door bell rang again, and she snapped back to reality. After a few more go’s and failing, she settled for using friction and tightness in her upper thighs and buttocks to keep the jeans in place, and she did the belt up to the last hole for insurance. Her jacket was tight around the back, but her shoes still fit. She put her glasses on her head and made her way to the door as quickly as possible, opening it as to see who was ringing the door bell so persistently.

She wish she hadn’t. As she let go of the door handle, beet red in the face, the door fully swung open to reveal...

......Jack Atlus.
1213.title: The doorbell rings.

131.content: How will Luna start off?
131.title: Before the show

1313.content: And just how fat will she be? Remember, weight gain is more pronounced on shorter frames such as hers.
1313.title: Fat

choices: during her time in the Spirit World
During the off time between Season 2 and 3
132.content:
During the show...so that means we have three choices, as is normal of early chapters.

-Her time in the Spirit world could have messed with her body.
-She's the easiest(aside from her bother) to kidnap
-There's this huge break in between Season 2 and 3 so potential weight related shenanigans could occur
132.title: During the show

1322.content:
From this point on, Luna will be taken away for the whole purpose to fatten her up. How she gains weight and how big she becomes is up to you.

But before we go straight into the absurd story, we need to choose the culprit of Luna’s embarrassing journey. Is this her brother or maybe some classmates? Maybe it’s just a crazy scientist using women as guinea pigs for his weight gain experiments? Or maybe even somebody else?
1322.title: She gets kidnapped

choices: Another classmate, like Sly or Patty
13221.content:
Thanks to her calm and friendly personality, Luna was liked by all her classmates and with her slim body and general cute appearance; she also managed to get attention of a bunch of make students.

However, despite her kindness and especially because of her slender build, there was one student in her class that had degenerate fantasies involving Luna gaining weight, mostly by being force fed against her will. Luckily, Luna wasn’t aware of these sick thought patterns of that specific person and these deranged thoughts were just mere fantasies.

Until now!

So, who is her classmate that wants to turn his dreams into reality?
13221.title: Friends or family

choices: Ask her to gain weight (backfires horribly)
Plan the force feeding and find a fitting place
132211.content:
Surprisingly, it’s her twin brother Leo who had developed those deranged fantasies. Leo was never really into his sister. He loved her dearly and protected her from all harm, but he never developed any romantically feelings to her in any shape or form.

One day, on a lazy Sunday, following thoughts echoed in his mind:

‘How would my sister look with extra weight?’

He wasn’t really sure why thoughts like this occurred, since he had absolutely no interests in fat chicks. And yet this single though of his sister gaining weight triggered a switch deep inside his inner being. It was mix of healthy curiosity and a strange fascination, which he simply couldn’t understand. From this point on, he dedicated a large part of his free time to imagine his own sister gaining weight by different means. He was addicted by that single thought for days, no matter how sick these were.

One day, Leo was ready to make his dreams come true and really fatten his sister up. Aside of the regular force feeding with lots of food over a longer period, he also bought some instant and temporary weight gain pills that, combined with food, will make that person gain weight instantly, but the weight gain will dissolve after one day, making her turn back normal like nothing happened. What will be used is up to the writer.

His first idea would be to convince his sister to gain weight. It will definitely backfire, but he could try it out.
The most likely scenario which will piss off Luna and maybe scar their relationship is to force fed her. Though, Leo had no clue where she should be confined.
132211.title: Her own brother Leo

13223.content:
Somebody else kidnaps Luna, huh....? With only two choices, it’s gonna be a tough choice.....but the culprits aren’t that hard to imagine.

Is Luna kidnapped and fattened up by a Dark Signer, to prevent the Signers from sealing off the old Enter-D reactors?

Or is she kidnapped by a force from the other 12 dimensions(or Worlds) that are connected to the Human World? Such as a wayward Duel Spirit, or one of the denizens of the Darkness World, or........maybe even the Astral World?
13223.title: Someone else

132232.content:
Oooooo, now this is getting fun.

We’ll start in numerical order, as such meaning A, for Astral World. Perhaps they kidnap Luna to study the human digestive system, it’s benefits and limits?
132232.title: Another World

1322321.content:
A voice. “Observation H293: Some humans are more fragile then others, especially with younger individuals.”
“That observation was unnecessary. 39% of our population were former humans.”
“For the sake of orderly data, it had to be made.”
Where.....where am I?..... Luna slowly tried to open her eyes, her body feeling lifeless and weak, her head still swimming in the sea of unconsciousness....
“A chamber will have to be modified for the test subject, as the oxygen count within the Astral World is far lower then in the Human World.”
“Yes. It would be a terrible shame if the subject were to expire before the tests begin.”
“Not to mention, it is not worth invoking the wrath of another World.....”
The...Spirit World.....? No...She could see glowing figures....Duel Sprits didn’t glow as far as she knew...Astral World...? What...where...was that?
“For now, the subject will be safe in the pod.”
“Should someone stand watch?”
“The scientist that will keep an eye on the pod can keep an eye on her.”
Test..what test......my head hurts....Luna, unable to keep her eyes open, let them close and drifted back in to unconsciousness.....
——-
Luna...Luna...wake up.
Luna’s eyes fluttered open, her body still feeling weak, but feeling much more alert at the same time. She was able to focus now, and she could see that she was......
1322321.title: Overlay this option.

1322322.content: Next up in the alphabet is B, for Barian World. Created when the Astral World attempt to purge itself from Chaos, we won’t need a definite reason for Luna getting kidnapped here,
1322322.title: Another World, B

choices: The two beings begin to converse outside Luna’s cell.
It goes quiet outside Luna’s cell.
13223221.content:
“...you think she’s still alive?”
“COURSE SHE IS! I only roughed her up a little!”
“You clearly roughed her up too much, then.”

Where....where am I? Luna’s eyes slowly fluttered open, her head pounding in pain.

“Hey, she’s opening her eyes....I think.”
“She’s still half unconscious from Megrez’s method, Dubhe.”
“Looks like she needs a wake-up call....luckily, I came prepared!”

There was a sloshing sound, and then, the cold wet, painful feeling of ice cold water splashed all over her, entered her throat and kicked her senses into overdrive, and Luna sat up with a start, hacking and coughing, face and chest wet, her head suddenly clear of pain. Trying to clear her eyes of water, Luna shut her eyes again. “*splutter* Hey! What’s the big-*cough*-“ Luna spluttered, before she opened her eyes to a startling sight. Right up in her face, was a mouthless, oddly lime coloured, human-like being with half a mask growing out of it’s face.....

“There we go. She’s up!” It spoke. Without a mouth.

Luna’s scream could be heard for miles.


“KKKKKYYYYYYYAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”



Eyes wide in terror, Luna scrambled backward fast as she could, untill her back collided with a rock wall. Glancing around in terror, Luna realised she was in a small cave, with just enough headroom for her to shit up and not hit her head....and worse, the human-like thing was blocking the caves’s entrance and exit. It’s eyes were closed in laughter, and an it was laughing, without a mouth! “W-w-What are you?!?” Luna screamed.
The human-like being didn’t hear her, on the account of laughing too hard. “AHAHAHAAHAH! The look on her face! Utterly priceless!” it cackled like a oversized gremlin.
“Megrez.......why must you be like this.....” she heard a second voice speak from outside the cave.
“Aw, Don’t be such a wet blanket, Merak! This is how I get my kicks!” The being, Megrez, replied.
“Well, you better have gotten them, because Dubhe and I going to drop this damm gate and lock you in there if you don’t hurry up and get out.” The voice, Merak, replied.
Megrez seemed to frown, and backed out of the cave. As soon as he vanished from view, a steel gate, along with a few grunts of painful relief from outside the cave, dropped down over the cave entrance, locking Luna in.

Luna realised that she had just been imprisoned.
13223221.title: Abducted?!

choices: “We feed her really big meals to keep her pinned down!”
“We assign a Duel Spirit guard to her cell to keep watch!”
132232211.content:
Luna may not have been able to see her alien(?) captors from where she was in the little cave she was jailed in, but she could still hear them.
“See, Merak? One ‘Signer’, all locked up with the others none the wiser! I didn’t think this job would be that easy!” That was Megrez, talking to the other two....things that had her prisoner. Another voice, that of Merak’s, spoke next. “It’s only easy because you’re thinking she’s like us, Megrez. There’s things you haven’t considered at all.”
Megrez was quick to reply. “What is there to consider?! We- hey, where are you going, Dubhe?!” Luna could hear footsteps walk-in away from the cave.
A third voice spoke up, the Dubhe in question. “I am off to inform the rulers that we have one of the Signers, that’s all.”
“Nash won’t like that we only have one, you know!” Megrez sounded out with a mocking tone. However, Merak was the one to respond. “That is a funny way to say Vector, Megrez.” An attempt at humor?
“I think the King will be please we have at least one. Besides, we have bait for the others now, don’t we?“ was Dubhe’s response. With his question answered with two different forms of ‘Yeah, he will’, the footsteps started up again and Duebe walked off, presumably to inform this ‘Nash’ of their success.

Luna began thinking, recapping what she had found out. These alien things, for a lack of a better word, had abducted her to serve as bait so they could capture all the Signers. So far, she had seen the three who had jailed her, a fellow named Vector, and some kind of rulers, one named Nash. If they had rulers, they must have been a civilisation. Why did they want to kidnap the Signers? And what exactly were these alien things?

“Anyway, back to my point, what is there to consider?! We have one of them, we can use her as bait, and the others will come and try to save her, and we’ll catch them in the attempt, and then King Nash, Lady Merag and Marin can do whatever they’re going to do with them.” Megrez quickly went back to his conversation with Merak, and thus so spoiled whatever plan these aliens had cooked up.

“Yes...but..” Merak paused for a moment, and then countered Megrez’s words with his own. “What if they don’t come immediately to save their fellow Signer? Or decide she’s not worth it? What if we only capture some of them when they come to rescue her, and the rest escape and have to be hunted down? Humans have different basic needs to us Barians, you know. Humans have to eat, drink, sleep, eject waste from their bodies....the list goes on, and we need to keep our prisoners alive untill we have all of them, or they won’t come...or worse, get mad and demolish us. Long term thinking.” Barians....that’s what they were? But more importantly, they were trying to prepare for the long haul....not good...

Megrez didn’t respond, and when he did, it was stutter filled.. “I.....um, I...I was tinki-kink.....thinking long term!” he spluttered out.
Merak didn’t believe him, from the tone of his voice. “Uh Huh....tell me then. How would you make a long term solution for keeping the prisoners fed and watered without giving her a chance to escape?” Uh oh....
Megrez’s voice, filled with uncertainty, responded with “Well......”
132232211.title: Discusion

13223222.content: Skipping ahead to S, for Spirit World. Perhaps they want to reward Luna for all she’s done with a feast......or five?
13223222.title: Another World, S

133.content:
It had been five months since Luna's last adventure with Leo and the other signers, and ever since, Luna couldn't do anything like she used to, things just didn't feel the same. After all those experiences she found every day life just boring and dull. Luna found going outside her house so boring, that nowadays she only did so to go to school, which she also found boring, and had just ende three weeks ago.

Luna spent most of her day just laying around, remembering her adventures with the others, almost wishing the world were in danger. However, Luna had found a new way to kill the time. Eating. Whenever she was bored, she would go to the kitchen and get some chips or cookies, and eat them while watching TV. But Luna was about to discover the price of her new hobby.

"Eeeeeek!" Luna's voice was heard from the bathroom." Ihave gained ...

Luna's recent weight gain was of...
133.title: Just boring

choices: Try to lose a bit of weight
1333.content:
"...20 pounds...!" Luna uttered in surprise. From 77 to 97 in 3 weeks....what was in those cookies?

While to some people, 20 pounds doesn't seem like much, it's actually quite a lot. Plus, the fact that Luna was still only 146 cm(not counting her brother, the second shortest in the Signers was Crow, at 174 cm), and that because she was short, there was less space on her body to distribute extra weight gained from her hobby of excessive snacking...

Simply put, Leo could use her as a body pillow with no trouble.

Luna wasn't too sure what to do next. Doing her best to hold her enlarged belly in her hands, she fiddled with it as she thought. Losing a bit of weight wouldn't hurt, and it would give her something to do....but she liked snacking mindlessly, and she didn't feel any worse from the extra weight. Or maybe she should ask her brother what he thought of the situation.
1333.title: 20 pounds

choices: Something new to snack on would be nice...
13332.content:
As tempting as it was to lose weight, Luna didn't think it was worth it. It was a lot of work, and she wasn't sure she could stick to it in her current state of mind.

Plus, Luna had found that she not only enjoyed snacking, but her increased mass as well. There was something about eating without a care that she liked, and fat...was a lot of fun to play with, actually! Luna let herself smile as she played around with her enlargened belly, squishing and melding it like dough in her hands.

Besides, a simple walk around town or a swim at the pool, plus help from a professional doctor would prevent any problems from occurring.....right?

She checked the scale again, only to see that her weight was actually 121 pounds, not 97. Her math was a bit off.......

Okay, maybe she needed to do some research. While snacking.

Or she could go for a walk and get some new types of snacks....then do some research.
13332.title: Just keep snacking

choices: Cookies and Chill on her bed!
Loungin around in the lounge room!
133321.content:
(Luna's size, for reference: https://img00.deviantart.net/c3cc/i/2016... (on the left, ignore Rin and Akiza)

Luna decided to do some research first, and finish off all of her snacks before getting some more snacks. She was feeling hungry, but not so that she wanted a proper meal. She put her clothes back on as best as she could-minus her shorts.

"How'd I not notice the damage to these?" Luna's poor shorts were stretched far past their breaking point, and had several small tears in them. She doubted that they wouldn't have lasted any longer had she not noticed her weight gain. Frankly, she wasn't too sure how they had survived up until now!

"They probably would have exploded right off me...!" Luna realized with a blush. Stepping out of the bathroom, she passed through the kitchen on her way to the bedroom to grabs some more cookies, and drape the stretched shorts over the bin. Opening the cookies, she devoured one of the delicious cookies in two bites.

When she entered her bedroom, the first thing she did was drop the cookies on her bed and then, bending other, opened her bedside drawer and pulled out a laptop, hidden underneath her undergarments. She had received the laptop as a birthday gift from Crow and Yusei, along with a few booster packs from the Invasion of Worms set(Likely free of cost, as Yusei had a part-time job setting up and updating the Duel Terminals.) Leo had got one too, and the siblings had sworn to each other to keep the two laptops separate. Luna had gotten a pink laptop case for her's and hidden underneath her undergarments when not in use or charging, cause she knew that Leo wasn't going to go looking there anytime soon. She placed it on her bed, and grabbed the charger cable as well.

Then, she waddled/walked over to her closet and opened it up, so she could try and cover her panties. Even though she wasn't going out, you never know who might pay a visit!

Obviously, none of her pants would fit her anyone, so she would have to wear one of her skirts....

"Hhhhmmmmgghhh...!...no good... "

....if she could get them around her waist. None of them came close to making it around her increased size! So, she joined two skirts together and tryed again. The super skirt fit! If just a bit.

"Sorta perfect...." Now, she needed to figure out where she was going to do her research. She wanted to obviously surf the web near a power outlet, of which there was one in the lounge room, and one in her room.

Which should she choose?
133321.title: Research and Chill.

choices: She makes it to the mall!
She spoke too soon about Sector Security not stopping her.....
133322.content:
....now that Luna was thinking, she realised that her current snack array was poor. She only had chips and biscuits, and both of those snacks had disadvantages. The chips were always sticking to her teeth, and those cookies, now that she realised, tasted bad. Not ‘horrible’, inedible bad, but there was something in them that she didn’t like the taste of. She would have to make the walk to the store and get some new snacks. She could save the ones she had now for lat-......actually, Leo could have them. She was newly fat, not newly a glutton!

Now with a goal in mind, Luna begun to put her clothes back on the best she could.....expect she stopped when she picked up her shorts. Her overstretched, overworked, shorts.

“How’d I not notice the damage to these?" Luna's poor shorts were stretched far past their breaking point, and had several small tears in them. Frankly, she wasn't too sure how they had survived up until now, as they were ready to give up the ghost.

“They would have burst right off me...!” Luna realised with a blush. Folding the pants up and slinging them over her shoulder like Leo would sling a towel, she made her way out of the bathroom, passing near the bin to place the shorts on the lid. She wasn’t too sure what to do with them right now, but if she wanted to go out in public, she needed to cover her panties.

Stepping into her room, she waddled/walked over to her closet and opened it. Obviously, none of her pants would fit her anymore, so she would have to wear some one her skirts. Pulling out a few skirts, she attempted to fit them around her expanded waistline, with little success.

"Hhhhmmmmgghhh...!...no good... "

....if she could just get them around her waist. None of them alone came close to making it around her increased size! So, she joined two skirts together and tried again. Luckily, the super skirt fit! If just a bit.

“Sorta perfect....at least for now.” She would have to buy a much big skirt or much bigger pants when she went out. Retreaving her Duel Disk and her deck from her bedside cabinet and strapping it to her arm, she headed for the front door. She nearly grabbed the last pack of cookies, but stopped herself and instead headed for the door. Leo would be back soon, and she could trust her brother to watch the place. Still, she grabbed her set of keys and locked the door when she exited the house, before slipping the keys into her bossom. “Who needs pockets, anyway?” Luna giggled.
——————-
“,>———/ 5DS
——————-
The mall wasn’t too far from Luna and Leo’s house, but due to the extra weight Luna was carrying on herself, it felt like the distance had increased by a fair bit. Not helping were the looks she was getting from passerby’s, a fair amount fixed on her backside. The looks on their faces were varied, but Luna figured most of them were because of her very much visible panties. It was a wonder someome Sector Security hadn’t stopped her yet! Still, she was getting closer to her destination.
133322.title: Something new to snack on would be nice...

14.content: how will she gain weight?
14.title: Misty

15.content: then how about these girls?
15.title: More

151.content:
Sherry LeBlanc (シェリー・ルブラン, Sherī Ruburan) is a female Turbo Duelist of French origin.
She has a fixation on getting vengeance against Iliaster due to them having killed her parents
Sherry uses a "Sacred Knight" Turbo Deck, primarily focused on Synchro Summoning her signature card, "Fleur de Chevalier". She also utilizes a large amount of cards to lock her opponent such as the latter card and "Chain Close". Sherry also uses several cards dedicated to negating attacks or prevention by battle such as "Floral Shield" and "Fleur Guard" respectively.

So, how does she gain weight?
Is she force-fed?
Does she gain weight willingly?
Or does she do so by accident?
151.title: Sherry

152.content:
Mina Simington, known as Mikage Sagiri (狭霧さぎり 深影みかげ, Sagiri Mikage) in the Japanese version, is the meek secretary to Rex Goodwin who watches over Jack Atlas. Despite her dedication and loyalty, Mina tends to unintentionally spark the wrath of her superiors. Mina loves Jack and rivals Carly and Stephanie for his affections. At the same time, Trudge has a crush on Mina.

She has never dueled in the anime, instead only in the games. In Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's World Championship 2010: Reverse of Arcadia, Mina played a Ritual Monster/Mill hybrid Deck, called Hidden Feelings.

How does she gain weight?
Accidentally, Intentionally, or is she Forcd Fed?

1531.content:
Andrea, known as Shoko Usami in the Japanese version, is a character appearing in the Tag Force series.
She’s a 2nd Tier Character.

Andrea uses Dinosaur Decks in every Tag Force game. From Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Tag Force 4 onwards, she uses Decks dedicated to the "Jurrac" and "Evol" archetypes as well.

Then wiki doesn’t have much else information on her, so go wild.

Anyway, how shall she gain?

Intentionally?
Unintentionally?
Or Force Fed?
1531.title: Andrea

1532.content:
Rin (リン Rin) is a Turbo Duelist who resides as a Common in New Domino City in the Synchro Dimension, and is Yugo’s childhood friend. Her de Headstrong and slightly tsundere.

Rin uses a "Windwitch" Deck, focused on Effect damage tactics. Her strategy consists of swarming the field with different "Windwitch" monsters such as "Windwitch - Ice Bell" in order to inflict effect damage and then subsequently Synchro Summoning "Windwitch - Winter Bell", which can copy the effects of monsters in the Graveyard in order to reutilize the effect of "Ice Bell" for more damage.

Yes I know she’s from a different series. Make her work in the 5DS world, somehow.
Also kill the Doktor with prejudice. Always kill the Doktor.

Anyway, how does she gain?

Unintentionally?
Intentionally?
Force Fed?
1532.title: Rin
